item.title: 大选在即，安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andrés Manuel López Obrador）挥金如土。问题是墨西哥付不起总统的账单👇。
item.description: Andrés Manuel López Obrador is splashing out as elections loom. The trouble is Mexico can’t pay the president’s bill econ.st/3UFfVa9 👇

item.title: 印尼希望在 2045 年成为发达经济体，但它面临着 "巨大的挑战"。即使没有大国竞争的阴影笼罩，这些挑战 "也很难应对"。
item.description: Indonesia faces “enormous challenges” to its hope of becoming advanced economy by 2045, says Ganjar Pranowo. They’re “hard enough to tackle, even without great-power competition looming in the background”, writes the presidential candidate in a guest essay econ.st/3HSupeW

item.title: 希望领导世界第三大民主国家的候选人发誓要将增长率提高到 7%。印尼人早已耳熟能详 👇。
item.description: Candidates hoping to lead the world’s third-largest democracy are vowing to raise its growth rate to 7%. Indonesians have heard it all before econ.st/49qZp1A 👇

item.title:
美国大型银行的老板们似乎对拟议中的新资本规则深恶痛绝。
黄金时段的广告警告经济将面临可怕的后果，高管们也毫不掩饰地发出威胁，这些都显示出他们有多么愤怒👇。
item.description:
Bosses of large banks in America seem to have been personally offended by proposed new capital rules.

Prime-time advertisements warning of dire consequences for the economy, and not-at-all-veiled threats from executives, show how just angry they are econ.st/3SpInK4 👇

item.title: 乌克兰地面部队司令奥莱克桑德尔-瑟尔斯基（Oleksandr Syrsky）接替瓦列里-扎卢日尼（Valery Zaluzhny）担任总司令。去年，我们对这位现在肩负着国家命运的人进行了报道 👇。
item.description: Oleksandr Syrsky, the head of Ukraine’s ground forces, has replaced Valery Zaluzhny as commander-in-chief. Last year we profiled the man who now has the fate of the country on his shoulders econ.st/49wpdtd 👇

item.title: 美国简讯是我们最新的每日时事通讯，跟踪报道总统竞选以及参议院、众议院和州机构竞选的进展情况。注册后，您将在收件箱中收到最重要的选举新闻综述 ⬇️
item.description: The US in brief, our latest daily newsletter, tracks developments in the presidential race and in contests for the Senate, the House of Representatives and state bodies. Sign up to get a round-up of the most important electoral news in your inbox econ.st/3w8Fy8S ⬇️

item.title: 中国的宣传人员声称，公众希望与台湾统一--而且愿意使用武力来实现这一目标。我们的 "鼓楼 "播客将为您揭示这是否真的是当地的真实想法 👇。
item.description: China’s propagandists claim that the public wants reunification with Taiwan—and is willing to use force to achieve it. Our “Drum Tower” podcast finds out if this is really the mood on the ground econ.st/3upYv6q 👇

item.title:
墨西哥总统正在与腐败指控作斗争。他否认有任何不当行为。
但事实是，安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔在解决社会问题方面做得太少👇。
item.description:
Mexico’s president is fighting claims of corruption. He denies any wrongdoing.

But the truth is that Andrés Manuel López Obrador has done too little to tackle the problem in society econ.st/3SBSUSL 👇

item.title: 云技术虽然令人瞩目，但没有理由认为它已接近完成。数据的产生和对数据分析的需求都在不断增长 👇
item.description: Remarkable as the cloud is, there is no reason to think it is anywhere near completion. The generation of data and the need for its analysis continue to grow econ.st/3SmJ1bg 👇

item.title:
互联网交换机的容量和数量不断增长，使网络得以发展成今天的样子。不过，许多人明天对它的需求将需要更多
插图：eBoy
item.description:
The growing capacity and number of internet exchanges have enabled the web to become what it is today. What many want of it tomorrow, though, will require more econ.st/3OtQzbm

Illustration: eBoy

item.title: 正如为贫困家庭提供税收减免可以缩小收入方面的种族差距一样，城市中的特许学校在阅读和数学方面也能起到同样的作用。共和党人应该重新点燃对特许学校的热情。乔-拜登（Joe Biden）应该着手帮助它们发展壮大。
item.description: Just as tax credits for poor families narrow racial disparities in income, so charter schools in cities do the same for reading and maths. Republicans should rekindle their enthusiasm for charters. And Joe Biden should set about helping them ﬂourish econ.st/4bwZBya 👇

item.title: 在季度财报电话会议上，AMD 公布了 2023 年 230 亿美元的强劲收入，是 2014 年的四倍。它能打破 Nvidia 在芯片领域的垄断地位吗？ 👇
item.description: In its quarterly earnings call AMD reported strong revenues of $23bn in 2023, four times what they had been in 2014. Could it break Nvidia’s chokehold on chips? econ.st/4bAvTIH 👇

item.title: 小型、廉价、装有炸药的无人机正在使士兵的生命变得更加危险。它们溜进坦克炮塔或壕沟。它们先追击猎物，然后再大开杀戒。它们给步兵和装甲兵造成了惨重的伤亡。它们就是未来 👇。
item.description: Small, cheap, explosives-laden drones are making soldiers’ lives more dangerous. They slip into tank turrets or dugouts. They pursue their quarry before going for the kill. They are inflicting a heavy toll on infantry and armour. They are the future econ.st/3SvuMB3 👇

item.title:
如果客户服务的核心功能是识别客户的愿望并予以满足，那么聊天机器人往往会在第一关就掉链子。
但这种情况不会持续太久。1843 杂志调查呼叫中心的未来
item.description:
If the core function of customer service is identifying the customer’s desire and satisfying it, then chatbots often fall at the first hurdle.

But it won’t be like that for long. 1843 magazine investigates the future of call-centres econ.st/3SrxGXG

item.title: 唐纳德-图斯克正在努力恢复波兰的法治。但修复上届政府造成的破坏需要勇气和耐心👇。
item.description: Donald Tusk is trying to restore Poland’s rule of law. But repairing the damage done by the last government will take grit and patience econ.st/3HUJ8WK 👇

item.title: 近几十年来，全球价值观发生了重大转变，而且是非同寻常的转变。探索我们的互动平台，了解它是什么👇。
item.description: In recent decades there has been a substantial shift in global values—and an extraordinary one. Explore our interactive to discover what it is econ.st/3uwPIQ6 👇

item.title:
瓦列里-扎卢日尼（Valery Zaluzhny）已被奥莱克桑德尔-瑟尔斯基（Oleksandr Syrsky）取代，成为乌克兰最高级别的军人。
这位乌克兰武装部队的新首领曾在莫斯科接受训练，他的同僚现在都是俄罗斯指挥官。他面临着重大挑战 👇。
item.description:
Valery Zaluzhny has been replaced by Oleksandr Syrsky as Ukraine’s top soldier.

The new head of the country’s armed forces trained in Moscow, alongside peers who are now Russian commanders. He faces a momentous challenge econ.st/499u6Z9 👇

item.description: The general’s dismissal marks a new and crucial phase in the war—one that Volodymyr Zelensky is in danger of getting wrong. Read more: econ.st/3T1JHVn

item.title: 2021 年 7 月，弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）发表了一篇文章，在 1000 年的历史中狂奔，声称俄罗斯人和乌克兰人是一个民族。这七张地图展示了他对过去的歪曲👇。
item.description: In July 2021 Vladimir Putin published an essay that raced through 1,000 years of history to argue that Russians and Ukrainians are one people. These seven maps demonstrate his distortion of the past econ.st/3Suge4I 👇

item.title: 人们普遍认为，历史在柏林墙倒塌和辣妹乐队创下第一张专辑之后就停止了，但现在，历史又重新开始了，而且发展得如火如荼。记录历史到底有多快？
item.description: History—widely assumed to have stopped somewhere around the fall of the Berlin Wall and the Spice Girls’ first record—has got going again, with gusto. How soon is too soon to chronicle it? econ.st/49lV9A8

item.title: 在 "情报 "节目中@AntonLaGuardia 与 @SecBlinken 一起再次访问中东。达成持久和平协议的希望有多大？请收听播客： 👇

item.title: 为什么企业难以使用大学的创意？企业实验室的消失是答案之一。这些机构是思想家和实干家生动活泼的混合体👇。
item.description: Why do companies struggle to use ideas produced by universities? The loss of the corporate lab is one part of the answer. Such institutions were home to a lively mixture of thinkers and doers econ.st/3ugi0hY 👇

item.title:
前总统米哈伊尔-萨卡什维利在返回格鲁吉亚后不久被捕。
他声称这些指控是出于政治动机，这在一定程度上是有道理的。但是，在该国的选举中，事关重大的不仅仅是一个人的自由。
item.description:
Shortly after his return to Georgia, Mikheil Saakashvili, the former president, was arrested.

He claims, with some justification, that the charges are politically motivated. But there is more at stake than one man’s freedom in the country’s elections econ.st/3ufAwaf

item.title: "2020 "加入了一系列关于科维德-19 的书籍行列。书中充满了关于封锁、面具和其他一切争论的细节，令人印象深刻。但对于刚刚经历过这一切的读者来说，这本书并不有趣👇。
item.description: “2020” joins a rash of books about covid-19. It is filled with impressive detail on arguments over lockdowns, masks and all the rest of it. But it is, for readers who have just lived through all of that, not much fun econ.st/3SN7k3z 👇

item.title: 马德里正处于一个重要时刻。自 2016 年以来，马德里的外来人口增长了 20%，其中大部分是拉丁裔，使这座城市日益成为迈阿密的竞争对手，成为 "拉丁美洲之都" 👇。
item.description: Madrid is having a moment. Its foreign population has grown by 20% since 2016, much of that Latino, making the city a growing rival to Miami as the “capital of Latin America” econ.st/49n1cEA 👇

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）希望在 2024 年期间生产 100 万架 "第一人称视角 "无人机。这些武器为何成为乌克兰战争的关键部分？ 👇
item.description: Volodymyr Zelensky, Ukraine’s president, wants to produce 1m First Person View drones over the course of 2024. Why have these weapons become a critical part of the war in Ukraine? econ.st/49rfJz5 👇

item.title:
自 2021 年达到顶峰以来，中国和香港股票市值下降了近 7 万亿美元。尽管美国股市上涨了 14%，印度股市上涨了 60%，但中国和香港股市的市值却下降了约 35%。
股价下跌预示着一个根本性问题 👇👇。
item.description:
The market value of China’s and Hong Kong’s shares is down by nearly $7trn since its peak in 2021. That is a fall of around 35%, even as that of America’s stocks has risen by 14%, and India’s by 60%.

The decline signals a fundamental problem econ.st/484jI3P 👇
